mapper.select: select num, title, content, userid, writeday from notice Order by num DESC
select num, title, content, userid, to_char(writeday, 'yyyy-mm-dd') writeday from notice where num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (num, title, content, userid, writeday) VALUES (notice_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{userid}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: update notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, userid = userid, writeday = sysdate where num=#{num}

select userid, password,nickname, phonenum, email, birthday from member where userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into member (uniqueid, userid, password, nickname, phonenum, email, birthday ) values (#{uniqueid},#{userid},#{password},#{nickname},#{phonenum},#{email},to_date(#{birthday}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') )
